reviews.text:
Had a wonderful time celebrating CNY here. The live music was fantastic as the band plays crowd favorites, and not the popular songs. The band do their best to keep the guest engaged !!

Service is very good and attentive. Wish there were more options for sharing plates but there is choice of both western and Sichuan food.

Ok.. the food is erm... not nice... well,.m at least not the ones I had... happy hour is before 6pm so it was usual price after that... overall more of a karaoke joint... the live band was super passable only...
This is a perfect place to chill after work, where we can eat, drink, sing, and enjoy live music.

While the live band and ambiance at Turandot were decent, I found the overall dining experience underwhelming. The food, priced at a premium, failed to meet expectations in terms of quality and taste. The dishes lacked the finesse and freshness that one would anticipate at such a venue. The live band added a pleasant touch to the atmosphere, but unfortunately, it wasn't enough to compensate for the lackluster culinary experience. If you're seeking a place primarily for good food, you might want to explore other options before settling here.

Very good place to come chill with friends colleagues and for birthday parties! Spacious, clean, family friendly live band place. Live band mostly starts at 8pm. Must try the spicy otah pizza. Very interesting and delicious. Bbq skewers were yummy too! Happy hour starts 4pm to 8pm. $58 to $78 for 1 3L tower. Not so crowded on a Wednesday night.
